title: Typesetter/Typography position at Target in Minneapolis
content:
Hello,

Due to the impending retirement of one of my colleages, Target Corporation in Minneapolis is looking for a full-time typesetter/typographer at corporate headquarters in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

Our work is a combination of a significant amount of typography production for print advertising and the circular, as well as font purchasing, font management and font manipulation for the corporation and its vendors.

Candidates should have a good eye for typesetting, a borderline OCD-like obsession with detail and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment with minimal supervision.

If you or someone you know is interested in more information about this opening, feel free to contact me directly at kristin.dooley (add the little squiggle here) target.com.

Feel free to pass the word!

Thanks,

Kristin
